Waltham.Arsenal Yards: Arsenal Yards (formerly known as Arsenal Mall from 1983 to 2013 and the Arsenal Project from 2013 to 2016) is a planned mixed-use, smart growth development in Watertown, Massachusetts, with an estimated opening date of spring 2019. The area is home to the original Arsenal Mall site, which is currently being redeveloped for Arsenal Yards. It will include 300,000 square feet of retail and restaurant, 200,000 square feet of office space, a 150-room Hampton Inn hotel and 425 residences.
